EUI - Release Notes

Version 1.8.5 (14.12.12)
  Erigone 3.2.5 with bug fixes; see Erigone release notes.

Version 1.8.4 (08.12.12)
  Improved error message when no Promela file is opened or saved.
  Always use limit parameters for Erigone in case save in config.
  Added null pointer exception handler for scrolling and set caret.
  Fixed bug: last state of interactive simulation was not displayed.
  "DEBUG" configuration options.
  EUI desktop icon in windows install file runs jar file.
  Erigone 3.2.3 fixes bug for negative values of type short.
  Erigone 3.2.4 fixes bug with atomic.

Version 1.8.3 (13.11.12)
  Forgot to remove debugging printouts from 1.8.2.

Version 1.8.2 (07.11.12)
  Correct bug: last state of simulation was not displayed.
  Include Erigone 3.2.2 that fixes the same bug in Trace.

Version 1.8.1 (24.08.12)
  Include Erigone 3.2.1 in the distribution.

Version 1.8 (16.07.12)
  Support search diversity in Erigone 3.2.0 by including random seed as a verification argument. The seed is also moved to the menu bar instead of being a menu item.

Version 1.7 (03.06.12)
  Only internal LTL formulas are allowed. A named internal LTL formula may be selected.
&nsbp; Limits and Trace added to the toolbar.

Version 1.6 (08.11.11)
  Modifications to allow an inline LTL formula to be used.
  The display of the state space has been removed since its functionality is superseded by the VMC postprocessor for Erigone.

Version 1.5.1 (24.05.10)
  Fixed: added "-q" parameter when running dot to suppress error messages.

Version 1.5 (25.03.10)
  Support for programs with non-active proctypes and run.
  Blanks are no longer terminators in strings for excluded variables and statements.

Version 1.4 (18.03.10)
  Distribution includes Erigone 2.1.5.

Version 1.3 (04.03.10)
  Fixed problem with forking "dot".
  Independence from Erigone distribution: examples and user's guide included.
  Quick start guide added.
  Cleanup of unused declarations in Config.java.
  Add message concerning counterexample.
  Display of Buchi automaton before a verification is now a configuration option.
  Add error message if Erigone arguments are invalid.

Version 1.2.1 (12.11.09)
  Arguments for Erigone were changed.

Version 1.2 (20.09.09)
  Generate state space diagram.

Version 1.1 (05.09.09)
  Version compatible with Erigone version 2.

Version 1.0 (10.07.09)
  Initial release.
